message.entry: Function handle for condition must produce a scalar when using ifStatement.
If branches must return the same number of outputs.
All outputs from function handles for true and false branches must have the same size and type.
Condition output must be an Expression.
True branch inputs must be Expressions.
True branch outputs must be Expressions.
False branch inputs must be Expressions.
False branch outputs must be Expressions.
Condition output must be an Expression and all other inputs and outputs in the call to IfStatement must be cell arrays containing Expressions.
